title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5003 - Computation Of Final Average Salary
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5003 - Computation Of Final Average Salary

State Regulations
§ 5003.1 - Three-year final average salary for members who join system prior to July 1, 1976
§ 5003.2 - Five-year final average salary for certain members who joined system prior to July 1, 1973
§ 5003.3 - Salaries for elected members of retirement board while on leave of absence during service on retirement board
§ 5003.4 - Final average salary for members joining the system on or after July 1, 1976
§ 5003.5 - Moneys paid pursuant to the excellence in teaching program
§ 5003.6 - Final average salary for Tier 6 members

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. LVIII, pt. 5003

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§501, 3602; Retirement
and Social Security Law, §§431, 443, 501, 512, 601, 608

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
